channel.title: Vipassana on Freetime
channel.description: Recent content in Vipassana on Freetime

item.title: Embracing Serenity in the Storm: My Vipassana Journey Amidst Career Uncertainties (1)
item.description: Join me as I recount my transformative ten-day Vipassana experience and draw parallels to the current challenges I face with job applications in Europe. Learn how the lessons from Vipassana can offer clarity and focus during uncertain times.

item.title: Embracing Serenity in the Storm: My Vipassana Journey Amidst Career Uncertainties (2)
item.description: Join me as I recount my transformative ten-day Vipassana experience and draw parallels to the current challenges I face with job applications in Europe. Learn how the lessons from Vipassana can offer clarity and focus during uncertain times.
